data.name: ASKED_FOR_LETTER_NOT_REC
data.value: Patients for who a risk letter has been asked for but not received.

data.name: ASKED_FOR_LETTER_NOT_REC_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented of those for who we have asked for a risk letter but have not yet received one.

data.name: ASK_FOR_RISK_LETTER
data.value: Ask For Outstanding Risk Letters

data.name: ASK_FOR_RISK_LETTER_SUMMARY
data.value: Produces a text file containing a list of study number, DOB, date of first appointment and hashed NHS numbers. These are for all the participants that have been flagged as ready for risk letters and have not received one yet. This can then be uploaded to CRA.

data.name: BC_DIAGNOSES
data.value: Breast Cancer Diagnoses

data.name: BC_DIAGNOSES_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code, Volpara score, survey answers and risk score of every patient who has been diagnosed with breast cancer

data.name: CHEMOPREVENTION
data.value: Chemoprevention

data.name: CHEMOPREVENTION_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who had a chemoprevention appointment in clinic, with the outcomes selected below.

data.name: CHEMO_AGREE_FILLED
data.value: Chemoprevention agreed in clinic, appropriate and prescription filled in

data.name: CHEMO_AGREE_NOT_APP
data.value: Chemoprevention agreed in clinic but not appropriate

data.name: CHEMO_AGREE_NOT_FILLED
data.value: Chemoprevention agreed in clinic, appropriate, but prescription not filled in

data.name: CHEMO_DISAGREED
data.value: Chemoprevention not agreed in clinic

data.name: CONSENTED
data.value: Patients who have consented

data.name: CONSENTED_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB and date of first appointment of every person who has consented.

data.name: CONSENTED_YET_TO_GET_FULL
data.value: Patients consented but without full details yet

data.name: CONSENTED_YET_TO_GET_FULL_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented of those who have consented to the study, but not had the full patient details uploaded into Collator yet.

data.name: DETAILED_REPORTS
data.value: Full Detail Reports

data.name: GENERATING_REPORT
data.value: Generating Report

data.name: GOT_LETTER_NOT_SENT
data.value: Patients for who we have a risk letter but it has not been sent.

data.name: GOT_LETTER_NOT_SENT_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented for those who we have received a risk letter from CRA but not sent it yet.

data.name: GOT_VOLPARA_NOT_ASKED
data.value: Patients for who Volpara data has been received but no risk letter has been asked for yet

data.name: GOT_VOLPARA_NOT_ASKED_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented of those who have received Volpara data but no risk letter has been asked for yet.

data.name: HISTOLOGY
data.value: Histology

data.name: HISTOLOGY_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show all histology records in the database.

data.name: INDEX_TITLE
data.value: Reports

data.name: INVITED
data.value: Patients who have been invited

data.name: INVITED_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB and date of first appointment of every person who has been invited.

data.name: INVITED_YET_TO_CONSENT
data.value: Patients invited but yet to consent

data.name: INVITED_YET_TO_CONSENT_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB and date of first appointment of every person invited but who has not yet consented.

data.name: NHS_NUMBER
data.value: NHS Number

data.name: NHS_NUMBER_NOT_EXIST
data.value: This NHS Number does not exist in the database.

data.name: NUMBER_ASSESS_RECALLS
data.value: Number of assessment recalls

data.name: NUMBER_RECALLS
data.value: Number of recalls

data.name: NUMBER_RECALLS_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who had a recall of the type selected below.

data.name: NUMBER_ROUTINE_RECALLS
data.value: Number of routine recalls

data.name: NUMBER_TECHNICAL_RECALLS
data.value: Number of technical recalls

data.name: PATIENT_DETAILS
data.value: Patient Details

data.name: PATIENT_REPORTS
data.value: Patient Reports

data.name: SCREENING_ATTENDANCE
data.value: Screening attendance

data.name: SCREENING_ATTENDANCE_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who attended screening within the chosen date below.

data.name: SCREENING_FIRST_OFFERED
data.value: Screening attendance at first offered screening episode

data.name: SCREENING_FIRST_OFFERED_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who attended screening on the first offered appointment.

data.name: SCREENING_WITHIN_180_DAYS
data.value: Screening attendance within 180 days of episode opening

data.name: SCREENING_WITHIN_180_DAYS_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who attended screening within 180 days of the first offered appointment.

data.name: STATUS_REPORTS
data.value: Collator Status Reports

data.name: SUBSEQUENT_CONSULTATION
data.value: Subsequent consultations

data.name: SUBSEQUENT_CONSULTATION_SUMMARY
data.value: This report shows the NHS Number, DOB, age, ethnicity, post code and risk score of every patient who attended subsequent consultations of the type below.

data.name: SUBSEQUENT_FAMILY_HISTORY
data.value: Family History Services

data.name: SUBSEQUENT_MORE_FREQUENT
data.value: More Frequent Screening

data.name: VOLPARA
data.value: Volpara

data.name: VOLPARA_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show all the Volpara record in the database.

data.name: WAITING_FOR_VOLPARA
data.value: Patients who have consented but we've not received Volpara data yet.

data.name: WAITING_FOR_VOLPARA_NEAR_6_WEEKS
data.value: Patients who have consented but we've not received Volpara data yet, and it is within 2 weeks of their 6 week deadline.

data.name: WAITING_FOR_VOLPARA_NEAR_6_WEEKS_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented for those who have consented to participate but we have yet to receive Volpara data and it is within 2 weeks of their deadline.

data.name: WAITING_FOR_VOLPARA_SUMMARY
data.value: This report will show the NHS Number, DOB, date of first appointment and date consented for those who have consented to participate but we have yet to receive Volpara data.
